properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 10 at 7:02PM MST until February 10 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Maricopa County in south central Arizona...

* Until 1000 PM MST.

* At 701 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated
heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small
stream flooding in the advisory area. Up to one inch of rain has
already fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Mesa, Fountain Hills, East Mesa, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field
Airport and Fort McDowell.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
